Uses of Package
thothbot.squirrel.core.client.shader

Packages that use thothbot.squirrel.core.client.shader
thothbot.squirrel.core.client.renderers Here is located WebGL renderer. 
thothbot.squirrel.core.client.shader Here are all shaders and shader's related code. 
thothbot.squirrel.core.shared.materials Here are all Materials used for the Geometric Objects. 
thothbot.squirrel.core.shared.scenes Here are Scene object - the main rendering object and all Scene additions such as fog. 
thothbot.squirrel.core.shared.utils Contains helper methods which are used overall in the project.
